T02TD1688E:25b-1: bha ga ba ti t'a ra de b'i ae ka bim sha ti sto tra no pi ya kam / bod skad du /
T02TD1688E:25b-2: bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la bstod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD1688E:25b-3: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1688E:25b-4: dus gsum rgyal ba bskyed mdzad yum //
T02TD1688E:25b-5: shes rab pha rol phyin bdag nyid //
T02TD1688E:26a-2: lha mo mchog de'i zhabs btud bshad //
T02TD1688E:26a-3: de nyid skyabs song sems bzang pos //
T02TD1688E:26a-4: sras bcas rgyal bas yongs bskor ba'i //
T02TD1688E:26a-5: 'phags ma nyid mdun mkhar bzhugs mchod //
T02TD1688E:26a-6: sdig bsal bsod nams longs rdzogs bya //
T02TD1688E:26a-7: rnam dag sngags kyis dri bsal la //
T02TD1688E:26a-8: sku gsungs thugs dngos bskyed dang rdzogs //
T02TD1688E:26a-9: cho ga ji bzhin ji snyed par //
T02TD1688E:26a-11: 'phags ma sgrol ma che nyid sku //
T02TD1688E:26a-12: yongs gyur 'dod sbyin sna tshogs gzugs //
T02TD1688E:26a-13: sna tshogs nor bu'i tshul bzhin du //
T02TD1688E:26a-14: gdul bya'i dbang can yongs gyur blta //
T02TD1688E:26a-15: ye shes gzhug cing byin brlabs la //
T02TD1688E:26a-16: dbang bskur mchod cing rgyas gdab bya //
T02TD1688E:26a-18: dngos grub blangs te bzlas pa bya //
T02TD1688E:26a-19: phyag 'tshal sgrol ma myur ma dpa' mo //
T02TD1688E:26a-20: spyan ni skad cig glog dang 'dra ma //
T02TD1688E:26a-21: 'jig rten gsum mgon chu skyes zhal gyi //
T02TD1688E:26a-22: ge sar bye ba las ni byung ma //
T02TD1688E:26a-23: spyan ras gzigs mgon thugs rje ma //
T02TD1688E:26a-24: chu skyes zhal gyi ge sar las //
T02TD1688E:26a-26: byung bas rab dga'i sgrol ma bsgom //
T02TD1688E:26a-27: mkha' dkyil gser mdog chu skyes gdan //
T02TD1688E:26a-28: zhal gcig phyag brgyad chos sgrogs dang //
T02TD1688E:26a-29: mda' gzhu 'khor lo ral gri dung //
T02TD1688E:26a-30: rdo rje zhags bcas me tog brgyan //
T02TD1688E:26a-31: de yi phrin las gzhan gyi mthu //
T02TD1688E:26a-32: phyir bzlog bsten phyir lha mo bsnyen //
T02TD1688E:26a-33: bsgrub bya'i rjes la dkyil 'khor bya //
T02TD1688E:26a-34: de dbus hom khung drag gzugs dgod //
T02TD1688E:26a-35: snying gar rtsibs brgyad spel tshig sngags //
T02TD1688E:26a-36: man ngag bzhin bkod thi gus drang //
T02TD1688E:26a-37: sbu gu snying gtang lha sbyor gyis //
T02TD1688E:26a-38: spod byed rten bral yang yang gzhug / lha mo khros pas mchod rten ni //
T02TD1688E:26a-39: nag po khri 'phang bzhi ldan brtsig / rgod gsung rna ba mgul ngang thos //
T02TD1688E:26a-40: snom pa'i sdud byed shes par byed ;
T02TD1688E:26a-41: / rgyun mi 'chad pa'i lha sbyor gyis //
T02TD1688E:26a-42: dgug gzhug bstims nas mnan bya ste //
T02TD1688E:26a-43: mtshan ma rnyed nas sngar gzugs sreg / rang gnas slar yang tsi tas mnan //
T02TD1688E:26a-44: nus ldan stong gis gcig brang kyang //
T02TD1688E:26a-45: mtshon cha'i sbyor ba slar nyes bzhin //
T02TD1688E:26b-0: bdag nyid bdag gis phung @26b bar byed //
T02TD1688E:26b-1: mchod bstod snying rjes mi gtong zhes //
T02TD1688E:26b-2: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re ma ma raksha raksha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:26b-3: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re che ge mo gri hna gri hna /
T02TD1688E:26b-9: a'a mu kam m'a ra ya phat /
T02TD1688E:26b-10: m'a ra ya tu re h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:26b-11: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re ma h'a panytsa yaksha stam bha ya hri bam hril ma ra ya phat ku ru ku la bhyo /
T02TD1688E:26b-12: rje bcun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma myur ma dpa' mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:26b-14: // / phyag 'tshal ston ka'i zla ba kun du //
T02TD1688E:26b-15: gang ba brgya ni brtsegs pa'i zhal ma //
T02TD1688E:26b-16: skar ma stong phrag tshogs pa rnams kyis //
T02TD1688E:26b-17: rab tu phye ba'i 'od rab 'bar ma //
T02TD1688E:26b-18: ston zla brgya yi zhal mdangs mnga' //
T02TD1688E:26b-19: stong phrag skar mas rab phye ba'i //
T02TD1688E:26b-21: mi shes mun sel bsgom par bya //
T02TD1688E:26b-22: ji bzhin cho gas rab sbrul yum //
T02TD1688E:26b-23: zhal gsum dkar sngo gser mdog can //
T02TD1688E:26b-24: bcu gnyis phyag mnga' mnyam gzhag dang //
T02TD1688E:26b-25: kha tv'am 'khor lo rin chen nyid //
T02TD1688E:26b-26: rdo rje me tog phreng 'dzin g-yas //
T02TD1688E:26b-27: ril ba autpala dril bu dang //
T02TD1688E:26b-28: bum pa dang ni po ti g-yon //
T02TD1688E:26b-29: sna tshogs lha mo'i rgyan gyis spras //
T02TD1688E:26b-30: sku spros gsung bzlas phyag mtshan thugs //
T02TD1688E:26b-31: rang rang rjes mthun phrin las sgrub//
T02TD1688E:26b-32: thun mong thun mong ma yin pas //
T02TD1688E:26b-33: mnyam gzhag rjes 'gro rtse gcig bya //
T02TD1688E:26b-34: phrin las yams nad zhi ba'i phyir //
T02TD1688E:26b-36: dbus su yum bcas 'od dpag med //
T02TD1688E:26b-37: phyogs mtshams rigs bzhi yum bzhi dgod //
T02TD1688E:26b-38: khor yug phyogs skyong bcas dkyil 'khor ;
T02TD1688E:26b-39: / ma lus rgyan gyis mdzes par bya //
T02TD1688E:26b-40: mchod dang gtor ma sngon song bas //
T02TD1688E:26b-41: gso sbyong ldan pas gsang sngags bzlas //
T02TD1688E:26b-42: khri phrag mchod gtor ldan pas 'bum //
T02TD1688E:26b-43: bzlas te lha yi sbyor ldan pas //
T02TD1688E:26b-44: nad sogs zhi bya gtsang sbras so //
T02TD1688E:26b-45: yams bdag mang po tshim par bya //
T02TD1688E:26b-46: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sarba by'a dhi pra sha ma na sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:26b-47: rje btsun ma sgrol ma ston zla lta bu zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:26b-49: // / phyag 'tshal gser sngo chu nas skyes kyis //
T02TD1688E:26b-50: padmas phyag ni rnam par brgyan ma //
T02TD1688E:26b-51: sbyin pa brtson 'grus dka' thub zhi ba //
T02TD1688E:27a-0: @27a * // bzod pa bsam gtan spyod yul nyid ma //
T02TD1688E:27a-1: shes rab bdag nyid phar phyin lnga //
T02TD1688E:27a-2: yongs rdzogs 'phags ma cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1688E:27a-3: rim gnyis bsgom zhing bzlas bya ste //
T02TD1688E:27a-4: rgya cher mchod bstod bsngags par bya //
T02TD1688E:27a-5: pad nyir skyil krung gser mdog zhal //
T02TD1688E:27a-6: gcig mda' phreng ba ral gri mda' //
T02TD1688E:27a-7: rdo rje dbyi gu dar dpyangs zhags //
T02TD1688E:27a-9: rjes mthun chog sngon song bas //
T02TD1688E:27a-10: tshe bsring phrin las dogs med bsgrub //
T02TD1688E:27a-11: gzhan srog tshe yang bsrungs nas ni //
T02TD1688E:27a-12: tshe dpag med bkug mchod bstod gsol //
T02TD1688E:27a-13: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re a'a yu rdzny'a na dha ra dha ra bi dha ra bi dha ra ya ma bra hi d'a ya de hi sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:27a-14: rang lo'i grangs kyi brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02TD1688E:27a-15: sangs rgyas kun dngos tshe yi dpal //
T02TD1688E:27a-16: grangs te nyi shu gcig bstod bya //
T02TD1688E:27a-17: zhag re zla re las tshe 'phel //
T02TD1688E:27a-18: rje btsun ma sgrol ma pha rol phyin ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:27a-20: // / phyag 'tshal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor //
T02TD1688E:27a-21: mtha' yas rnam par rgyal ma spyod ma //
T02TD1688E:27a-22: ma lus pha rol phyin pa thob pa'i //
T02TD1688E:27a-23: rgyal ba'i sras kyis shin tu bsten ma //
T02TD1688E:27a-24: gtsug tor yid bzhin nor bus mtshan //
T02TD1688E:27a-25: bdud dgra 'tshe ba kun las rgyal ;
T02TD1688E:27a-26: / pha rol phyin kun yongs rdzogs pas //
T02TD1688E:27a-27: bdag nyid che rnams kyis mchod bsgom //
T02TD1688E:27a-28: gser mdog chu skyes ri mo can //
T02TD1688E:27a-29: zag med chags med rnam gnon zhing //
T02TD1688E:27a-30: gser ri ltar brjid phyag bzhi mdzes //
T02TD1688E:27a-31: mchog sbyin phreng ba ril ba dbyug / de las srog g-yo rnams 'jil ba //
T02TD1688E:27a-33: garba su kha gcig pu skyes //
T02TD1688E:27a-34: ma ghi bee ro tsa na sbyar //
T02TD1688E:27a-35: lha mor yid brtan mang bzlas nas //
T02TD1688E:27a-36: gnas lngar gdab cing khong du sbyin //
T02TD1688E:27a-37: rtse gcig ha las 'tsho sgros bya ba //
T02TD1688E:27a-38: rang bzhin bcos sogs sel don med //
T02TD1688E:27a-39: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re na ma /
T02TD1688E:27a-40: sha re sha re bi sha re sarba brahma gha ta sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:27a-41: rje btsun ma sgrol ma gtsug tor rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:27a-43: // / phyag 'tshal tutt'a ra h'um yi ges //
T02TD1688E:27a-44: 'dod dang phyogs dang nam mkha' gang ma //
T02TD1688E:27a-45: 'jig rten gsum po zhabs kyis mnan te //
T02TD1688E:27b-0: lus pa med par @27b 'gugs par nus ma //
T02TD1688E:27b-1: mthu chen sngags kyi h'um sgra yis //
T02TD1688E:27b-2: khams gsum rgyas 'gengs srid gsum gnon //
T02TD1688E:27b-3: kun bdag bkug nas dbang sdud ma //
T02TD1688E:27b-4: dbang bsgyur che nyid rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1688E:27b-5: zla steng rdo rje'i zhabs gnon cing //
T02TD1688E:27b-6: skyabs sbyin gser gyi pad lcug 'dzin //
T02TD1688E:27b-8: ma chags gdul bya kun skyong mdzad //
T02TD1688E:27b-9: phrin las bsgrub phyir lhar bsnyen ma //
T02TD1688E:27b-10: ras la rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo bri //
T02TD1688E:27b-11: bsgrub bya'i gzugs sogs mig dang ldan //
T02TD1688E:27b-12: wa sham ku ru khrag gis bri //
T02TD1688E:27b-13: aom gsum rim pa'i rgyal mo'i dbus //
T02TD1688E:27b-14: skye mched gsal rdzogs spra tshil gzugs //
T02TD1688E:27b-15: lha mos bsdus te snying gar gzhug / dus gsum dus drug seng ldeng bsreg / sgo gnyis zangs ma'i thur mas bru //
T02TD1688E:27b-16: sa bon 'od dmar shugs drag gi //
T02TD1688E:27b-17: lcags kyus bkug ste zhags pas bcings //
T02TD1688E:27b-18: skra yengs gcer bu rkang 'dud bsam //
T02TD1688E:27b-19: dur khrod rjes gsum rdo rje'i chus //
T02TD1688E:27b-20: sbyar te sngags bcas sbyin par bya //
T02TD1688E:27b-21: de rjes ske tshe ming dang bcas //
T02TD1688E:27b-22: dbang sdud yid kyis sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1688E:27b-23: bdun phrag zhag ni gcig dang gnyis //
T02TD1688E:27b-24: de bzhin bdun gyi mi mo dang //
T02TD1688E:27b-25: mi pho lha mo sogs dbang bskur //
T02TD1688E:27b-26: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu rel pbha lambha so s'a tiksha si au kvo si ba sham ka ra ya aa mu kam sya dhyarma gha da ni ra ha tra tsa ma na ba bhya: sid ha da ha sthi dhya ma ma sdza ka dha ha lam pa na bi ru ti pa la n'a pa tsa ti ratne tam ba lan darya ma ne hi ku to ni ku ku tro ro tro tri ya ti ba sa ne hi ba lan ba dha phu ra sa kri tam /
T02TD1688E:27b-27: aom tsi tri tsi tri bi lo li la bi lo la sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:27b-28: a'a mu kam s'a dha nam pa ra pa t'amme da sa ma na ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:27b-29: aom ku ru kulle hr'i: sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:27b-31: me tog bdug pa bza' btung dag / byin na brgya byin yang dbang byed //
T02TD1688E:27b-32: me tog dmar po'i sbyin sreg gces //
T02TD1688E:27b-33: yungs kar skyes bu mchog la bsngags //
T02TD1688E:27b-34: 'khar ba'i snod du sbrang rtsi mar //
T02TD1688E:27b-35: sngags dang bcas gus dus gsum du //
T02TD1688E:27b-36: mchod pa bcas pas don rnams 'grub //
T02TD1688E:27b-37: kham phor ram ni dung phor du //
T02TD1688E:27b-38: sbrang rtsi sogs la brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02TD1688E:27b-39: bzlas so mig byugs dgra po yang //
T02TD1688E:28a-2: dur khrod gnas su snod chen ni //
T02TD1688E:28a-3: padma dkar dang chen po'i snum //
T02TD1688E:28a-4: brgya dang bcu bzhi bsgrub byas pa'i //
T02TD1688E:28a-5: mig sman gyis ni gzhan dga' byed //
T02TD1688E:28a-6: rje btsun ma sgrol ma srid gsum 'gugs pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:28a-9: // / phyag 'tshal brgya byin me lha tshangs pa //
T02TD1688E:28a-10: rlung lha sna tshogs dbang phyug mchod ma //
T02TD1688E:28a-11: 'byung po ro langs dri za rnams dang //
T02TD1688E:28a-12: gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mdun nas bstod ma //
T02TD1688E:28a-14: che rnams dbang phyug dpal ldan ma //
T02TD1688E:28a-15: 'jigs chen sdig spyod srid zha yi //
T02TD1688E:28a-16: dngos grub ster mdzad mkhas pas bsgom //
T02TD1688E:28a-17: padma nyi ma la gnas dmar //
T02TD1688E:28a-18: zhal gcig phyag bzhi rdo rje gri //
T02TD1688E:28a-19: sdigs mdzub zhags bsnams rjes mthun bsgrub //
T02TD1688E:28a-20: lha tshogs kun la skyon sel ma'o //
T02TD1688E:28a-21: las sgrub 'gro la phan yid kyis //
T02TD1688E:28a-22: dben par dkyil 'khor bzang byas te ;
T02TD1688E:28a-23: / bgegs bsal phrin las gtor ma byin //
T02TD1688E:28a-24: lha mo spyan drangs mchod bstod gsol //
T02TD1688E:28a-25: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas bsgom par bcas //
T02TD1688E:28a-26: gnas gsum lus ngag yid sdig skyon //
T02TD1688E:28a-27: sdig gzugs bsams la byab par bya //
T02TD1688E:28a-28: de rjes bkru dang bsreg par bya //
T02TD1688E:28a-29: lus bkrus 'dam skyes sdud dang skyes //
T02TD1688E:28a-30: mkha' la rgyu dang rtsod las rgyal //
T02TD1688E:28a-31: ngan skyugs rgal sogs ltas 'thon nas //
T02TD1688E:28a-32: sdig ldan gzhan yang sbyang bar bya //
T02TD1688E:28a-33: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02TD1688E:28a-34: na ma a'arya ba lo ki te shvar'a ya /
T02TD1688E:28a-37: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T02TD1688E:28a-38: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re ma ma sarba p'a pam /
T02TD1688E:28a-43: sarba bha ba sa mu dhitsotsha sha ra yam sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:28a-44: dngos sam gzugs sam gzugs brnyan la //
T02TD1688E:28a-45: mi dge kun bsdus stobs bzhir bcas //
T02TD1688E:28a-46: 'phags pa'i sku gsung thugs bden pas //
T02TD1688E:28a-47: bdag dang 'gro kun sdig bsal bya //
T02TD1688E:28a-48: rje btsun ma sgrol ma sdig pa las rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:28a-50: // / phyag 'tshal trat ces bya dang phat kyis //
T02TD1688E:28a-52: g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang zhabs kyis mnan te //
T02TD1688E:28b-1: ma lus rgol 'joms lha mo che //
T02TD1688E:28b-2: trat phat sgra yis pha rol gnon //
T02TD1688E:28b-3: padma ser dang nyi ma la //
T02TD1688E:28b-4: g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang stang stabs mdzes //
T02TD1688E:28b-5: tsham rngam gnag cing khros pa'i bzhin //
T02TD1688E:28b-6: na bza' ser bsnams lto 'gros brgyan //
T02TD1688E:28b-7: phyag bzhi 'khor lo ral gri dang /
T02TD1688E:28b-8: skye gnas steng zhags sdig mdzub mdzad //
T02TD1688E:28b-9: rjes mthun las kyi 'chi bslus la //
T02TD1688E:28b-10: de las gong mar 'pho bar bya //
T02TD1688E:28b-11: phyi nang gsang bas 'gro ba la //
T02TD1688E:28b-12: srog sbyin tshogs bsags mchod rten bsgrub //
T02TD1688E:28b-13: lha mo 'dod sbyin yid kyi bltas //
T02TD1688E:28b-14: sgo gnyis 'jug ldog rlung sbyangs la //
T02TD1688E:28b-15: gnyug mar gnas pa'i yi ge gsum //
T02TD1688E:28b-16: gcig tu bsdus te steng du 'phang //
T02TD1688E:28b-17: hi kas lam phye t'am gis drangs //
T02TD1688E:28b-19: dri med chos sku las ma g-yos //
T02TD1688E:28b-20: sna tshogs gnas su sprul sku 'phro //
T02TD1688E:28b-21: rje btsun ma sgrol ma gzhan 'joms 'pho ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:28b-23: // / phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum mtshon phyag rgya //
T02TD1688E:28b-24: sor mos thugs kar rnam par brgyan ma //
T02TD1688E:28b-25: ma lus phyogs kyi 'khor los brgyan pa'i //
T02TD1688E:28b-26: rang gi 'od kyi tshogs rnams 'khrug ma //
T02TD1688E:28b-27: sangs rgyas chos las legs skyes shing //
T02TD1688E:28b-28: dge 'dun kun skyong brtse chen ma //
T02TD1688E:28b-29: phyogs dang phyogs bral 'khor lo'i bdag / rang skyes 'od kyis kun skyes bsgom //
T02TD1688E:28b-30: padma dmar dang zla steng du //
T02TD1688E:28b-31: bandu ltar dmar phyag bzhi ma //
T02TD1688E:28b-32: gnyis dang gnyis las rab dga' yi //
T02TD1688E:28b-33: rang bzhin mya ngan med shing 'dzin ;
T02TD1688E:28b-34: / rjes mthun las kyi don bsgrub cing //
T02TD1688E:28b-35: de la mchod tshogs sngon 'gro bas //
T02TD1688E:28b-36: bsnyen cing bsgrubs nas tshogs bsags te //
T02TD1688E:28b-37: de nyid gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1688E:28b-38: byin brlabs ma brlabs yon tan skyon //
T02TD1688E:28b-39: shes gsal mi gsal bsrung byas te //
T02TD1688E:28b-40: yongs rdzogs mandala gsum pa'i tshad //

T02TD1688E:29a-4: slar yang phyag mtshan lha sbyor las //
T02TD1688E:29a-5: rigs lnga bsgoms te dbang mchog bskur //
T02TD1688E:29a-6: khrus byas dris byug kun rdzogs sbyar //
T02TD1688E:29a-7: aom sarba ta th'a gadta k'a ya bi shodha ne h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:29a-9: aom a'a: h'um dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD1688E:29a-10: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD1688E:29a-11: ye shes pa spyan drang ba'i sngags so //
T02TD1688E:29a-12: de nas man ngag ldan pa yis //
T02TD1688E:29a-13: mchod nas sngags bzlas spyan phye la //
T02TD1688E:29a-14: slar yang rab tu rgyas pa'i las //
T02TD1688E:29a-15: mchod cing sbyin sreg bcas mnga' gsol //
T02TD1688E:29a-16: aom a'a: t'a re pushpa dh'u pam d'i pa gandhe nee bi tya badzra h'um mchod pa'i sngags so //
T02TD1688E:29a-17: aom tsakshu tsakshu sa manta tsakshu bi sho dha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:29a-18: thur mas spyan dbye ba'i sngags so //
T02TD1688E:29a-19: aom su pra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:29a-20: me tog la bzlas pa dang gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02TD1688E:29a-21: aom h'um bhr'um kham badzr'i bha ba dri dho tishtha bhr'um kham ;
T02TD1688E:29a-22: bzhugs nas mandala dbul ba'i sngags so //
T02TD1688E:29a-23: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg las kun byed //
T02TD1688E:29a-24: bstan skyong mchod pas srung bar byed //
T02TD1688E:29a-25: srung 'khor ldan byas gnod med byed //
T02TD1688E:29a-26: gtor ma rgyas byin rgyas par byed //
T02TD1688E:29a-27: mchog gi mnga' gsol rab gnas kyis //
T02TD1688E:29a-28: byin brlabs 'bar dang rgyun ring gnas //
T02TD1688E:29a-31: rje btsun ma sgrol ma mchog stsol ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:29a-33: // / phyag 'tshal tu re 'jigs pa chen mo //
T02TD1688E:29a-34: bdud kyi dpa' bo rnam par 'joms ma //
T02TD1688E:29a-35: chu skyes zhal ni khro gnyer ldan mdzad //
T02TD1688E:29a-36: dgra bo thams cad rab tu gsod ma //
T02TD1688E:29a-38: dpa' bo las kyang dpa' mo che //
T02TD1688E:29a-39: khros pas dgra gsod dgra chen dgra //
T02TD1688E:29a-40: dbang bskur kun sbyin dbang bdag bsgom //
T02TD1688E:29a-41: padmar zla gdan chu srin gdan //
T02TD1688E:29a-42: gser mdog skyil klung phyed zhal gcig / aa shva ka dang rin chen mchog / padma bum las dbang mchog ster //
T02TD1688E:29a-43: rjes mthun las byed nyon mongs kyis //
T02TD1688E:29a-44: nyon mongs kun sel dbang bsgrub bya //
T02TD1688E:29a-45: rigs gsum las skyes smin byas te//
T02TD1688E:29b-0: @29b cho gas sbu gur snying po drang //
T02TD1688E:29b-1: nyi zla nam mkha' sbrang rtsi'i bcud //
T02TD1688E:29b-2: lhan cig skyes zhes mi 'bral bsgom //
T02TD1688E:29b-3: zag dang bcas las zag pa med //
T02TD1688E:29b-4: zhi la 'od gsal dmigs bral dag / mkhas pas lus dang lus med las //
T02TD1688E:29b-5: me tog rtsi'am til mar ltar //
T02TD1688E:29b-6: thabs ldan thabs bral legs blangs bstan //
T02TD1688E:29b-7: mthar ni yang dag mkha' mnyam nyid //
T02TD1688E:29b-8: rje bcun ma sgrol ma bdud 'joms dbang ster ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:29b-10: // / phyag 'tshal rab tu dga' ba brjid pa'i //
T02TD1688E:29b-11: dbu rgyan 'od kyi phreng bas spel ma //
T02TD1688E:29b-12: bzhad pa rab bzhad tu tatt'a ra yis //
T02TD1688E:29b-13: bdud dang 'jig rten dbang du mdzad ma //
T02TD1688E:29b-14: ting 'dzin dam pas thugs bltams te //
T02TD1688E:29b-15: dgyes shing dgyes pas rol pa'i stangs //
T02TD1688E:29b-16: dbu rgyan lnga yi lha 'od kyis //
T02TD1688E:29b-17: bzhad cing rab bzhad bsgom par bya //
T02TD1688E:29b-18: padmar zla steng byi ru'i mdog / zhal gcig phyag bzhi dang po gnyis //
T02TD1688E:29b-19: spyi bor bcings dang ral gri 'phyar //
T02TD1688E:29b-20: aa shva ka yi yal ga 'dzin //
T02TD1688E:29b-21: rjes mthun las rnams bsgrub mdzad ma //
T02TD1688E:29b-22: mnyes byas du mas gsol btab pas //
T02TD1688E:29b-23: bgegs bsal gtor ma sngon byin la //
T02TD1688E:29b-24: sa blang stegs bu bzang po bya //
T02TD1688E:29b-25: ri rab steng gnas gzhal yas khang //
T02TD1688E:29b-26: bum pa lnga ldan mchod bstod gsol //
T02TD1688E:29b-27: dam tshig bskyed la rdzogs par bsgrub //
T02TD1688E:29b-28: 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas pa bya //
T02TD1688E:29b-29: mig gnyis nyi ma zla ba yis //
T02TD1688E:29b-30: phyogs kun bsregs nas lha mo yi //
T02TD1688E:29b-31: dkyil 'khor dam pa mkha' la blta //
T02TD1688E:29b-33: 'khyil pa'i sngags brjod gom pa brgyar //
T02TD1688E:29b-34: rngam par bya ste dra gur bya //
T02TD1688E:29b-35: 'byung chen lha mo dpang bzhag nas //
T02TD1688E:29b-36: dkyil 'khor mchog ni rgyas par bri //
T02TD1688E:29b-37: phyogs bzhi nas gus tshig bzhi yis //
T02TD1688E:29b-38: gsol btab dam tshig ye shes kyi //
T02TD1688E:29b-39: dkyil 'khor bskyed dang gzhug sogs bya //
T02TD1688E:29b-40: bu dang bla ma'i dris lan brjod //
T02TD1688E:29b-41: mandala sngon song so shing sbyin //
T02TD1688E:29b-42: sngags bcas nyal bas rmi brtags la //
T02TD1688E:29b-43: lha yid kun ldan rdul tshon dgod //
T02TD1688E:29b-44: mchod bstod bsgom zhing bzlas sogs bya //
T02TD1688E:29b-45: aom dha rod badzra sa ma ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:30a-0: @30a * // gsang bar bsdams te mna' dor la //
T02TD1688E:30a-1: byin brlabs chu sbyin gdong g-yogs nas //
T02TD1688E:30a-2: me tog dor te dkyil 'khor gzhug / rtags ldan brtan pa phyag rgyas gdab //
T02TD1688E:30a-3: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re tsitta mandala badzra sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD1688E:30a-4: dkyil 'khor bstan cing gsol btab la //
T02TD1688E:30a-5: sangs rgyas kun bzhu lha mo yi //
T02TD1688E:30a-6: rnal 'byor kun ldan ye shes lnga'i //
T02TD1688E:30a-7: dbang bskur slob ma mchog la sbyin //
T02TD1688E:30a-8: aom a'a badzra darsha dzny'a na aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD1688E:30a-9: aom badzra sa ma ta dzny'a na ratna aa bhishinytsa m'am /
T02TD1688E:30a-10: aom badzra pra tya beksha na dzny'a na aa bhi sham nytsa m'am /
T02TD1688E:30a-11: aom kri tya aa nushtha na dzny'a na badzra aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD1688E:30a-12: aom tsakra aa mo gha dzny'a na aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD1688E:30a-13: de nas rdo rje sbyin te /
T02TD1688E:30a-14: aom badzra sa ma ya strvam aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD1688E:30a-15: de nas rgyan dang srung ba sbyin la /
T02TD1688E:30a-16: aom badzra raksha raksha h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD1688E:30a-17: lung bstan cing dbugs phyangs la /
T02TD1688E:30a-18: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re siddha sa ma ya stvam sv'a bh'a ba ya bhi shanytsa m'am /
T02TD1688E:30a-19: rdo rje slob dpon nyid du dbang bskur la /
T02TD1688E:30a-20: aom t'a re tat'a re tu re he he aabhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD1688E:30a-21: phyir mi ldog par dbang bskur la /
T02TD1688E:30a-22: aom badzra be wa rti aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD1688E:30a-23: chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur la /
T02TD1688E:30a-24: aom dharm'a r'a dza'a pra ti sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:30a-25: rjes su nad ba'i dbang bskur la /
T02TD1688E:30a-26: aom badzra aa nunytsa aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD1688E:30a-27: 'di dag slob ma'i dbang bcu ste //
T02TD1688E:30a-28: phal cher bum pa la gnas phyir //
T02TD1688E:30a-29: bum pa'i dbang du brjod pa yin //
T02TD1688E:30a-30: dang po yang ni thob par byed //
T02TD1688E:30a-31: de bzhin gsang ba shes rab kyi //
T02TD1688E:30a-32: dbang bskur bcu yi ye shes dang //
T02TD1688E:30a-33: sku gsum thob byed bla ma'i zhal //
T02TD1688E:30a-34: bdud rtsi bzhi pas rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1688E:30a-35: rje btsun ma sgrol ma mya ngan sel byed kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i yan lag ces bya ba rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:30a-37: // / phyag 'tshal sa gzhi skyong ba'i tshogs rnams //
T02TD1688E:30a-38: thams cad 'gugs par nus pa nyid ma //
T02TD1688E:30a-39: khro gnyer g-yo ba yi ge h'um gis//
T02TD1688E:30a-40: phongs pa thams cad rab tu sgrol ma //
T02TD1688E:30a-41: dpal ldan sa skyong phyogs rnams dang //
T02TD1688E:30a-42: phyogs bral ma lus 'gugs byed ma //
T02TD1688E:30a-43: de nyid snying po rab g-yo bas //
T02TD1688E:30a-44: phongs pa mtha' dag sel mdzad bsgom //
T02TD1688E:30a-45: rjes mthun cho gas las bsgrubs nas //
T02TD1688E:30b-0: pad nyi la bzhugs g-yas @30b brkyang rol //
T02TD1688E:30b-1: mun mdog zhal gcig phyag gnyis g-yas //
T02TD1688E:30b-3: dpa' mo bsnyen pas 'gro phan yid //
T02TD1688E:30b-4: brgya rtsa brgyad ni gus bsgoms la //
T02TD1688E:30b-6: ka rbi'a ra'i mes mchod bya //
T02TD1688E:30b-7: bum bzang snod du lnga phrag lnga //
T02TD1688E:30b-8: rin chen gzugs spras snying po gzhug / gang 'dod bzhir ni bgegs bsal la //
T02TD1688E:30b-9: lha mo nor gyi dbang phyug brten //
T02TD1688E:30b-10: aom t'a re tutt'a re dzam bhe mo he sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:30b-11: rje btsun ma sgrol ma 'gro ba 'gugs shing phongs pa sel ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:30b-14: // / phyag 'tshal zla ba'i dum bus dbu brgyan //
T02TD1688E:30b-15: brgyan pa thams cad shin tu 'bar ma //
T02TD1688E:30b-16: ral pa'i khur nas 'od dpag med las //
T02TD1688E:30b-17: rtag par shin tu 'od rab 'dzag ma //
T02TD1688E:30b-18: gang gis gsol btab bkra shis dang //
T02TD1688E:30b-19: dge legs rgyas mdzad zla tshes brgyan //
T02TD1688E:30b-22: mtshan mas rjes mthun las bsgrubs nas //
T02TD1688E:30b-23: slar yang chu skyes ri bong can //
T02TD1688E:30b-24: rdo rje'i skyil krung gis gnon dpal //
T02TD1688E:30b-25: gser mdog zhal gcig phyag brgyad blta //
T02TD1688E:30b-26: rtse gsum lcags kyu rdo rje gri //
T02TD1688E:30b-27: rin chen lcags kyu dbyu gu ril //
T02TD1688E:30b-28: thugs rjes tshar gcod rjes 'dzin ma //
T02TD1688E:30b-30: shis pa'i phyogs su thab brtsigs te //
T02TD1688E:30b-31: dbus su t'am ldan autpala bskor //
T02TD1688E:30b-32: sreg rdzas g-yas dang mchod rdzas g-yon //
T02TD1688E:30b-33: 'o ma can shing sbrang rtsi mar//
T02TD1688E:30b-34: bsangs te so sor byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1688E:30b-35: rin chen las byas tshad ldan gyis //
T02TD1688E:30b-36: dgang gzar blugs gzar rdo rje dril //
T02TD1688E:30b-37: bsangs te ku shas gcal bkram bya //
T02TD1688E:30b-38: rgyun bzhag bram ze'i mes sbar la //
T02TD1688E:30b-39: bsang zhing rlung yab kyis bskyod bya //
T02TD1688E:30b-40: 'bar ba'i ched du lan gsum gsum //
T02TD1688E:30b-41: bdag med byin za mchod nas bstim //
T02TD1688E:30b-43: gsum gsum gyis ni lan bdun du //
T02TD1688E:30b-44: mar gyi dgang blugs gus pas sbyin //
T02TD1688E:30b-45: rnal 'byor ldan pas rtse gcig go / aom aagna ye aa di bya aa bi sa ma ya r'a shri ye ha bya ka bya ma h'a ka na sv'a h'a //
T02TD1688E:31a-1: bgegs dgra bzlog / bzang na gsol btab dngos grub blang //
T02TD1688E:31a-2: sdig ldan sbangs nas gso sbyong can //
T02TD1688E:31a-3: gus shing snying rje ldan par mchod //
T02TD1688E:31a-4: ao aa bhi bha ksha aagna ye ma ma sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:31a-5: de rjes dgang blugs zhabs bsil bya //
T02TD1688E:31a-6: mchod bstod 'dod don gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1688E:31a-7: de rjes lha bskyed sogs mchod nas //
T02TD1688E:31a-8: dgang blugs phul la rdzas rnams mchod //
T02TD1688E:31a-9: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02TD1688E:31a-10: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
T02TD1688E:31a-13: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T02TD1688E:31a-14: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re ma ma sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:31a-15: dgang blugs dbul zhing mchod bstod la //
T02TD1688E:31a-16: slar yang me lha bskyed rdzas dbul //
T02TD1688E:31a-17: mchod bstod bshags shing byang chub bsngo //
T02TD1688E:31a-18: kun don phrin las thams cad grub //
T02TD1688E:31a-19: rje btsun ma sgrol ma bkra shis thams cad sbyin ma'i sbyin sreg bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:31a-21: // / phyag 'tshal bskal pa tha ma'i me ltar //
T02TD1688E:31a-22: 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i dbus na gnas ma //
T02TD1688E:31a-23: g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum kun 'khor dga' ba'i //
T02TD1688E:31a-24: dgra yi dpung ni rnam par 'joms ma //
T02TD1688E:31a-25: smin byed rlag byed dpa' mo ni //
T02TD1688E:31a-26: mi bzad me dpung dbus na brjid //
T02TD1688E:31a-27: rten byed sdang byed dga' mdzad cing //
T02TD1688E:31a-28: 'joms byed dgra gzugs can de bsgom //
T02TD1688E:31a-29: padma dmar dang nyi ma la //
T02TD1688E:31a-30: bzhengs pa'i dor stabs brkyang bskum ma //
T02TD1688E:31a-31: mi bzad r'a ga ltar dmar mdog / kun du 'phro zhing kun bsreg mdzad //
T02TD1688E:31a-32: zhal gcig phyag bzhi mchu smin g-yo //
T02TD1688E:31a-33: ral gri mda' dang 'khor lo gzhu //
T02TD1688E:31a-34: gcod 'bigs gshag cing bsnun byed las //
T02TD1688E:31a-35: bgegs dgra phra rab rdul mi gnas //
T02TD1688E:31a-36: gser mdog nor bu aindra dang //
T02TD1688E:31a-37: sbur long 'phags pa'i gdung thal dang //
T02TD1688E:31a-38: bri ha ti dang gu gul dang //
T02TD1688E:31a-39: bdud rtsi lnga sogs sbyar ba'i spos //
T02TD1688E:31a-40: rnal 'byor ldan pas bdug byas na //
T02TD1688E:31a-41: stong phrag brgyad cu'i ma lus bgegs //
T02TD1688E:31a-42: nags mes shing skam ji bzhin 'joms //
T02TD1688E:31a-43: rims sogs dug sogs de bzhin no //
T02TD1688E:31a-44: bsgrub bya'i gzugs la lha mo yis //
T02TD1688E:31a-45: nga rgyal gyis bkug rtsub mo'i shing //
T02TD1688E:31a-46: rten phral ling ga gtubs nas bsregs //
T02TD1688E:31a-47: bsnyen bsgrub las la go rims bzhin //
T02TD1688E:31a-48: 'bum phrag stong phrag brgya rtsa brgyad//
T02TD1688E:31b-0: @31b bzlas te khro mo'i hom khung zhal //
T02TD1688E:31b-1: phul nas gsum bdun nyi shu gcig / zhag gis tshangs par gyur kyang gsod //
T02TD1688E:31b-2: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re dha ma dha re sa h'um /
T02TD1688E:31b-3: spho ta bha smi ku ru h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:31b-4: rje btsun ma sgrol ma yongs su smin pas dgra bgegs gzhom pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:31b-6: // phyag 'tshal sa gzhi'i ngos la phyag gis //
T02TD1688E:31b-7: mthil gyis bsnun cing zhabs kyis brdungs ma //
T02TD1688E:31b-8: khro gnyer g-yo ba'i yi ge h'um gis //
T02TD1688E:31b-9: rim pa bdun po rnams ni 'gems ma //
T02TD1688E:31b-10: 'gugs byed snun byed rdung byed ma //
T02TD1688E:31b-12: lha mo nyid bsnyen gus pa yis //
T02TD1688E:31b-13: zhe sdang dang bral khro bas bsgrub //
T02TD1688E:31b-14: stong zil gnag mdog zhal gsum ma //
T02TD1688E:31b-15: g-yas dkar g-yon dmar khros pa'i zhal //
T02TD1688E:31b-16: thod pa'i do shal rgyu ma gsol //
T02TD1688E:31b-17: sbrul brgyad kyis brgyan stag lpags gsol //
T02TD1688E:31b-18: phyag drug ral gri lcags kyu dang//
T02TD1688E:31b-19: dbyu gu de bzhin thod khrag bkang //
T02TD1688E:31b-20: zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo 'dzin ma //
T02TD1688E:31b-21: khams gsum rim bdun cig car 'gems //
T02TD1688E:31b-22: rjes mthun las rnams sngon song bas //
T02TD1688E:31b-23: dar dkar dril byag lha sbyor gyis //
T02TD1688E:31b-24: chu skyes ge sar aom dang aa'i //
T02TD1688E:31b-25: mtha' rten mda' brgyad 'bru brgyad bri //
T02TD1688E:31b-26: bden bzhi'i rten 'brel mtha' skor dang //
T02TD1688E:31b-27: rigs lnga'i snying pos brgyan pa yi //
T02TD1688E:31b-28: sna tshogs rdo rje mdzes pa dang //
T02TD1688E:31b-29: a'a li k'a li mu khyud bskor //
T02TD1688E:31b-30: mthar byed sngags dang ral gri yi //
T02TD1688E:31b-31: rab phyi rol rim gnyis dgod //
T02TD1688E:31b-32: de nas 'bar ba'i ra ba ste //
T02TD1688E:31b-33: shis pa'i snag tsha sa mnyam gzhag bri //
T02TD1688E:31b-34: mchod cing ye shes 'khor lo gzhug / nga rgyal ldan pas rgyas btab la //
T02TD1688E:31b-35: bdug pas bdug cing mgul du gdags //
T02TD1688E:31b-36: 'di yis mi srung gang yang med //
T02TD1688E:31b-37: rje btsun ma sgrol ma 'gugs byed mas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:31b-39: // / phyag 'tshal bde ma dge ma zhim /
T02TD1688E:31b-40: mya ngan 'das zhi spyod yul nyid ma //
T02TD1688E:31b-41: sv'a h'a aom dang yang dag ldan ma //
T02TD1688E:31b-42: sdig pa chen po 'joms pa nyid ma //
T02TD1688E:31b-43: lha mo bde mas mtho ris sbyin //
T02TD1688E:31b-44: dge mas thar pa sbyin pa ste //
T02TD1688E:31b-45: de bzhin zhi mas rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1688E:31b-46: sbyin mdzad sdig 'joms bsgom par bya //
T02TD1688E:31b-47: padma dkar dang zla ba la //
T02TD1688E:32a-1: krung kunda'i mdog / phreng ba mchog sbyin dbyu gu dang //
T02TD1688E:32a-3: rtsa ba'i bsnyen ldan khrus byas te //
T02TD1688E:32a-4: bgegs bsal bsod nams spel phyir ro //
T02TD1688E:32a-5: lha sbyor ldan dang rdzas tshang dang //
T02TD1688E:32a-6: dad dang snying rje btson pas yid //
T02TD1688E:32a-7: nyams dga'i phyogs su stegs bu bcas //
T02TD1688E:32a-9: rdo rje me phreng mdzes bskor zhing //
T02TD1688E:32a-10: phyogs skyong bkra shis rtags ldan bri //
T02TD1688E:32a-11: ral gri me tog mda' dang dar //
T02TD1688E:32a-12: rma bya tshon skud dung dkar sogs //
T02TD1688E:32a-13: ba dan bla re rgyal mtshan gdugs //
T02TD1688E:32a-14: me tog phreng sogs mchod gtor bsham //
T02TD1688E:32a-15: lha mo'i ting 'dzin las sbrul pa //
T02TD1688E:32a-16: rin chen khang brtsegs rgya chen nang //
T02TD1688E:32a-17: dngos grub mtsho skyes bcom ldan ma //
T02TD1688E:32a-18: cho ga gsum gyis bskyed gzhug mchod //
T02TD1688E:32a-19: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02TD1688E:32a-20: na mo a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
T02TD1688E:32a-23: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T02TD1688E:32a-24: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sarba gra he /
T02TD1688E:32a-28: sarba dur sv'a pa ni bhya: sarba p'a pam sha ma n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:32a-29: rig pa'i rgyal mo'i mtha' skor du //
T02TD1688E:32a-30: gzugs mdzes kyis ni brgya stong grangs //
T02TD1688E:32a-32: bzhu ste bdud rtsi'i rdzing bur byas //
T02TD1688E:32a-33: dug sel sgros byab sdig gdon sogs //
T02TD1688E:32a-34: mi sdug gzugs su phyung byas khrus //
T02TD1688E:32a-35: rig sngags bkra shis bcas te gdon //
T02TD1688E:32a-36: rjes la mchod bstod bzod par gsol //
T02TD1688E:32a-37: lan cig lan gsum lnga dang bdun //
T02TD1688E:32a-38: khrus byas nad sel gdon zhi byed //
T02TD1688E:32a-40: rtag tu byas na dngos grub thob //
T02TD1688E:32a-41: rje btsun ma sgrol ma zhi ba chen mo phyi khrus kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:32a-43: // / phyag 'tshal kun nas bskor rab dga' ba'i //
T02TD1688E:32a-44: dgra yi dpung ni rab tu 'gems ma //
T02TD1688E:32a-45: yi ge bcu pa'i sngags ni bkod pas //
T02TD1688E:32a-46: rig pa h'um las sgrol ba nyid ma //
T02TD1688E:32a-47: yid gzhungs dran sogs kun nas bskor //
T02TD1688E:32a-48: mi shes dgra dpung rab 'joms ma //
T02TD1688E:32a-49: blo gros yi ge bcu bkod pas //
T02TD1688E:32a-50: h'um las srid zhi'i mun sgrol bsgom //
T02TD1688E:32b-0: padma'i ge sar @32b nyi ma la //
T02TD1688E:32b-1: sems dpa'i skyil krung bya ru'i mdog / dgra 'joms rtse gsum thugs kar 'dzin //
T02TD1688E:32b-3: thugs kyi snying po reg pa mchog / yi ge bcus bskor 'dod pa yi //
T02TD1688E:32b-4: dngos grub kun ster blo gros spel //
T02TD1688E:32b-5: thams cad snying gi dbus gnas ma'o //
T02TD1688E:32b-6: thugs rje'i rang bzhin shes rab mchog / gcig tu phan mdzad dngos grub sbyin //
T02TD1688E:32b-7: ji ltar gzhan blo spel de ltar //
T02TD1688E:32b-8: bdag gi blo mchog rgyas par mdzad //
T02TD1688E:32b-9: dag gi dbang phyug zhi phra dmar //
T02TD1688E:32b-10: bdag gyur g-yon mdun rgyab tu //
T02TD1688E:32b-11: yid gzhungs dran dang shes rab dang //
T02TD1688E:32b-12: blo 'phel lha mo bzhi bsgom bya //
T02TD1688E:32b-13: srid pa'i 'khor lo zla ba'i dbus //
T02TD1688E:32b-14: rnam snang sgrol ma las byung dngos //
T02TD1688E:32b-15: rtsa rig 'od kyis mun sel bskyed //
T02TD1688E:32b-16: mi smra'i sbyor bas gsang sngags bzlas //
T02TD1688E:32b-17: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re hr'i:/
T02TD1688E:32b-18: mah'a ma y'am ga pradzny'a pri dh'a ma h'a sa ra sa tyee na ma pra kri ta pa ri shuddha sarba dharm'a pra kri ta pa ri shuddhonyaham /
T02TD1688E:32b-19: sarba ma h'a bha yan t'a ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:32b-20: sman rnams sbyar bas bzlas nas ni //
T02TD1688E:32b-21: zla ba drug dang gsum mam gcig / zos nas thos mang 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD1688E:32b-22: tshe ldan tshangs pa'i nga ro thob //
T02TD1688E:32b-23: de bzhin gser mdog dri ldan sngags //
T02TD1688E:32b-24: zla gcig zla gsum zla ba drug / bsnyen pas yid gzhungs dran ldan zhing //
T02TD1688E:32b-26: rje btsun ma sgrol ma dgra 'joms mas blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:32b-28: // / phyag 'tshal tu re zhabs kyis brdabs pas //
T02TD1688E:32b-29: h'um gi rnam pa'i sa bon nyid ma //
T02TD1688E:32b-30: ri rab manda ra dang 'bigs byed //
T02TD1688E:32b-31: 'jig rten gsum rnams g-yo ba nyid ma //
T02TD1688E:32b-32: bde ldan lha mos zhabs brdabs pas //
T02TD1688E:32b-34: h'um yig sa bon las skyes mgon //
T02TD1688E:32b-35: ri rab kun bskyod dbang sdud bsgom //
T02TD1688E:32b-36: rab dkar pad dbus nyi ma la //
T02TD1688E:32b-37: h'um yig las skyes kun bde ster //
T02TD1688E:32b-38: sems dpa'i skyil krung dmar ser mdzes //
T02TD1688E:32b-39: phyag gnyis ri bong 'dzin bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1688E:32b-40: de bsnyen dben par gtsang khang bsham //
T02TD1688E:33a-2: mandala mchod bcas gtor mar bcas //
T02TD1688E:33a-3: de bzhin gtum mo me mchod bcas //
T02TD1688E:33a-4: chom rkun la sogs snying brtse bas //
T02TD1688E:33a-5: lha mo gtor ma 'dod byin la //
T02TD1688E:33a-6: yan lag dgu ldan mchod byas nas //
T02TD1688E:33a-7: zhi drag gnyis kar gsol ba gdab snying ga'i 'od kyis sems can khams //
T02TD1688E:33a-8: kun khyab slar yang thugs rje yi //
T02TD1688E:33a-9: aa las bsil zer de steng t'am //
T02TD1688E:33a-10: yongs gyur sngar gzugs lha mo yi //
T02TD1688E:33a-12: sna tshogs rgyan mdzes lha rdzas kyi //
T02TD1688E:33a-13: mchod sprin dbus bzhugs che dgus mchod //
T02TD1688E:33a-14: mgul rgyan gdu bu do shal 'dzin //
T02TD1688E:33a-15: 'bru gsum gyis brgyan nam mkha' yi //
T02TD1688E:33a-16: tshon gzugs dang bltas gsal bar bya //
T02TD1688E:33a-17: phyag gi bdud rtsis bdag skyong bar //
T02TD1688E:33a-18: bsams la gsang sngags lo grangs gdon //
T02TD1688E:33a-19: na mo a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya ;
T02TD1688E:33a-22: ma h'a k'a runi k'a ya /
T02TD1688E:33a-24: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sarba du sht'am pra dusht'am ma ma kri tv'an /
T02TD1688E:33a-29: h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sarba stam bha ni t'a re sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:33a-30: phyi yi phyag rgya zhabs 'og mnan //
T02TD1688E:33a-31: nang gi dbugs kyis drangs te bsreg / bsgrub bya'i 'khor lo bcings te dril //
T02TD1688E:33a-32: de skyong lha ni gtor mas bskrad //
T02TD1688E:33a-33: gang 'gro'i phyogs su dpal chen mo //
T02TD1688E:33a-34: zhal bzang bdag la gzigs par bsam //
T02TD1688E:33a-35: de la bstod dang bzlas gsol bya //
T02TD1688E:33a-37: rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma bde ldan mas chom rkun bcing ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:33a-39: // / phyag 'tshal lha yi mtsho yi rnam pa'i //
T02TD1688E:33a-40: ri dvags rtags can phyag na bsnams ma //
T02TD1688E:33a-41: t'a ra gnyis brjod phat kyi yi ges //
T02TD1688E:33a-42: dug rnams ma lus par ni sel ma //
T02TD1688E:33a-44: zag med bde rgyas du sel ma //
T02TD1688E:33a-45: mnyes byas rdzas dang sngags sbyor bas //
T02TD1688E:33a-46: dug rnams las rgyal bsgom par bya //
T02TD1688E:33a-47: padma dkar steng zla dbus su //
T02TD1688E:33a-48: 'dab bzang khri steng skyil krung bzhugs //
T02TD1688E:33a-49: gnyis kyi spyi bor lcags kyu 'dzin //
T02TD1688E:33b-0: @33b gzhan gnyis mchog sbyin po ti bsnams //
T02TD1688E:33b-1: lha mnyes rnal 'byor ldan pa yis //
T02TD1688E:33b-2: gdon rigs lnga yis dug brtags la //
T02TD1688E:33b-3: rdzas rigs lnga la gsang sngags lnga //
T02TD1688E:33b-4: 'bum phrag gsum bzlas gnas lngar byugs //
T02TD1688E:33b-5: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re ku ru kulle hr'im:/
T02TD1688E:33b-6: sarba sha tr'um bha ksha ya h'um h'um n'a ga stam bha ya mo h'a ya bandha ya ram yam kham sum ne ra pa ne h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:33b-7: dam tshig rdzas ni dang po la //
T02TD1688E:33b-8: gu gul gla rtsi shu dag dang //
T02TD1688E:33b-9: ru rta btsan dug shing kun nyid //
T02TD1688E:33b-10: gla rtsi mi bskyod bcas sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1688E:33b-11: gnyis pa gnyis 'gyur shu dag bla //
T02TD1688E:33b-12: ru rta gu gul mu zi nyid //
T02TD1688E:33b-13: ro ras rgya tshil gshin dri chen //
T02TD1688E:33b-14: phag bcud sgog skya ma dhu ra //
T02TD1688E:33b-15: mi yi bcud dang rus pa'i phye //
T02TD1688E:33b-16: mi yi bcud bsdus ril bu'o //
T02TD1688E:33b-17: snga ma'i gnyis 'gyur bsnyen pa yis //
T02TD1688E:33b-18: rig pa nyid dang lha sbyor nyid //
T02TD1688E:33b-19: gsum pa la ni gsum 'gyur nyid //
T02TD1688E:33b-20: gzhan yang klu dug bdud rtsi bsten //
T02TD1688E:33b-21: bzhi pa yang na bzhi 'gyur nyid //
T02TD1688E:33b-22: klu dug rnam rgyal bsten par bya //
T02TD1688E:33b-23: lnga pa lnga 'gyur aa ru ra //
T02TD1688E:33b-24: mi bskyod gla rtsi khyad par bsten //
T02TD1688E:33b-25: nyi 'od mun pa mi yi rdul //
T02TD1688E:33b-26: ji bzhin dug rnams 'joms par byed //
T02TD1688E:33b-27: rje btsun ma sgrol ma rnam par rgyal mas klu nad gso ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:33b-29: // / phyag 'tshal lha yi tshogs rnams rgyal po //
T02TD1688E:33b-30: lha dang mi 'am ci yis bsten ma //
T02TD1688E:33b-31: kun nas go cha dga' ba'i brjid kyis //
T02TD1688E:33b-32: rtsod dang rmi lam ngan pa sel ma //
T02TD1688E:33b-33: sa gsum dbang pos rab mchod cing //
T02TD1688E:33b-34: kun nas dga' bskyed 'bar ba yi ;
T02TD1688E:33b-35: / gzi yis ltas ngan sdug bsngal sel //
T02TD1688E:33b-36: brtson bas dus drug bsgom par bya //
T02TD1688E:33b-37: padma dkar dang nyi steng du //
T02TD1688E:33b-38: g-yas brkyang skyil krung kunda'i mdog / sna tshogs 'od phreng sku brgyan nas //
T02TD1688E:33b-39: me thab bsnams shing sdug bsngal bsreg / ltas mthong bsnyen pas 'phags ma nyid //
T02TD1688E:33b-40: skyabs song sbyor gzhan spangs nas ni //
T02TD1688E:33b-41: ba lang lcis byugs dkyil 'khor bya //
T02TD1688E:33b-42: dbus su gsung thugs sku bskyed bya //
T02TD1688E:33b-43: de nyid spyan drangs mchod sngon 'gro / gsol btab snying brtses bsnyen pas so //
T02TD1688E:33b-44: khri brtson lo grangs brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02TD1688E:33b-45: mchod bstod gsol ba ma yengs bya /
T02TD1688E:34a-0: @34a * // na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02TD1688E:34a-1: na mo a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
T02TD1688E:34a-4: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T02TD1688E:34a-9: bha ga ba ti tutt'a re bha ya mo tsi tu re sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:34a-10: rje btsun ma sgrol ma sdug bsngal bsregs pas khri mon las thar pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:34a-12: // / phyag 'tshal nyi ma zla ba rgyas pa'i //
T02TD1688E:34a-13: spyan gnyis po la 'od rab gsal ma //
T02TD1688E:34a-14: t'a ra gnyis brjod tutt'a ra yis //
T02TD1688E:34a-15: shin tu drag po'i rims ni sel ma //
T02TD1688E:34a-16: ye shes lha mo ye shes spyan //
T02TD1688E:34a-17: rab gsal bsgribs dang mi bsgribs gzigs //
T02TD1688E:34a-18: ngan 'gro dang ni srid pa'i nad //
T02TD1688E:34a-19: nyon mongs bcas 'joms bsgom par bya //
T02TD1688E:34a-20: 'dab skyes dmar steng zla ba la //
T02TD1688E:34a-21: sems dpa'i skyil krung gser zangs mdog / phyag gnyis thugs kar gser bum 'dzin //
T02TD1688E:34a-22: nad 'joms dngos grub kun ster mdzad ;
T02TD1688E:34a-23: /'dab pa zangs mig lce ma khris pa bsnams //
T02TD1688E:34a-24: ri rab kyis bcas ga 'ur gzhug / lha mo nyid sku gsung dang thugs //
T02TD1688E:34a-25: yi ge gsum bskyed bsrung ba'i mchog / rig pa'i rgyal mo t'am yi ge //
T02TD1688E:34a-26: mig sman bsdus nas kun mthong zhing //
T02TD1688E:34a-27: gzhan mthong mi mthong sbyin par byed //
T02TD1688E:34a-28: sped byed gzungs ni 'bum phrag bzlas //
T02TD1688E:34a-29: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02TD1688E:34a-30: na mo a'ary'a ba lo ki te sv'a r'a ya /
T02TD1688E:34a-33: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T02TD1688E:34a-35: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re ya tu dza ye dza ye tutt'a re dza ya bo dhi tu re sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:34a-36: rje btsun ma sgrol ma dngos grub 'byung bas mi snang bar byed pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:34a-38: // / phyag 'tshal de nyid gsum rnams bkod pas //
T02TD1688E:34a-39: zhi ba'i mthu dang yang dag ldan ma //
T02TD1688E:34a-40: gdon dang ro langs gnod sbyin tshogs rnams //
T02TD1688E:34a-41: 'joms pa tu re rab mchog nyid ma //
T02TD1688E:34a-42: lha dang sngags dang ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD1688E:34a-43: de nyid gsum bkod mthu chen mo //
T02TD1688E:34a-44: gnas gsum gnod pa'i tshogs 'dzoms ma //
T02TD1688E:34a-45: yi ge gnyis ldan bsgom par bya //
T02TD1688E:34a-46: cho ga kun ldan rjes mthun pa'i //
T02TD1688E:34a-47: lha bsnyen mchod bzlas goms pa yis //
T02TD1688E:34a-48: de nyid gsum ni rtag tu dran //
T02TD1688E:34b-1: ha skyes khyu mchog pad zla la //
T02TD1688E:34b-2: skyil krung phyed bzhugs stag sham can //
T02TD1688E:34b-3: zhal gcig rnam thar spyan gsum phyag / mu tig phreng dang mdung rtse gsum //
T02TD1688E:34b-4: skar mdog rab dkar mun sel byed //
T02TD1688E:34b-5: gsang sngags sgra yis srid gsum 'gengs //
T02TD1688E:34b-6: dug gsum mdung rtse gsum gyis bsnun //
T02TD1688E:34b-7: sgrub la dngos grub kun rdzogs mdzad //
T02TD1688E:34b-8: de yis mkha' spyod mthong ster ma //
T02TD1688E:34b-9: lha bsnyen yid kyi shugs goms pas //
T02TD1688E:34b-10: zangs lcags gser las ral gri bya //
T02TD1688E:34b-11: tshad ldan a'a k'a bcu phreng brgyan //
T02TD1688E:34b-12: sngags bzlas rab 'bring tha ma'i rtags //
T02TD1688E:34b-13: me tog 'od zer 'phro ba dag / mthong nas chags med yid kyis bskyod //
T02TD1688E:34b-15: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mo gha siddhi khadge pa lo ka a'a lo ka tishtha ratna tsa la tsa la h'um h'um h'um bam bam sth'am sv'a h'a /
T02TD1688E:34b-16: rje btsun sgrol ma yongs su rdzogs byed mas mkha' spyod kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:34b-18: // /'phags mchog lha mo yid bzhin dbang gi rgyal po 'di //
T02TD1688E:34b-19: nyi shu gcig bcas bstod pa'i rgyal po'i rjes sgrub thabs //
T02TD1688E:34b-20: sgrol ma mngon 'byung le'u lnga brgya bdun cu par //
T02TD1688E:34b-21: gang gsungs gsal byas de dges 'gro yid mun sel shog / bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD1688E:34b-22: rje btsun lha mo mchog nyid kyi skus rjes su bzung ba'i slob dpon chen po nyi ma sbas pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1688E:34b-24: // / dpal chos kyi rje ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gsum bar grags pa'i pandi ta chen po bsod snyoms pa kha che sh'akya shr'i bha dra dang /
T02TD1688E:34b-25: lo ts'a ba byams pa'i dpal gyis /
T02TD1688E:34b-26: bod yul dbus kyi gtsug lag khang chen po sol nag thang po che dang /
T02TD1688E:34b-27: pho brang dam pa khra 'brug gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o /
T02TD1688E:34b-30: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo /
T02TD1688E:34b-31: dgra bcom pa nyi ma gung pa /
T02TD1688E:34b-32: dgra bcom pa sha na'i gos can /
T02TD1688E:34b-33: dgra bcom pa krishna'i gos can /
T02TD1688E:34b-34: kha che nyi ma sbas pa /
T02TD1688E:34b-38: lo ts'a ba byams pa'i dpal /
T02TD1688E:34b-39: bla ma bsod nams rgyal mtshan /
T02TD1688E:35a-1: che ba tshad ma'i skyes bu /
